title: Double door industrial refrigerator US-BCL0623S
short_description: There has always been a need for refrigerators to keep fruits and vegetables good and of good quality. This refrigerator is designed for storing large quantities of food in restaurants, cafes and large kitchens. The internal capacity, that is, the volume, is 866 liters and operates at 220V voltage.
short_description_uz: Meva va sabzavotlarni yaxshi va sifatli saqlash uchun har doim muzlatgichlarga ehtiyoj bo'lgan. Ushbu muzlatgich restoranlar, kafelar va katta oshxonalarda katta hajmdagi oziq-ovqatlarni saqlash uchun mo'ljallangan. Ichki sig'imi, ya'ni hajmi 866 litrni tashkil etadi va 220V kuchlanishda ishlaydi.
short_description_ru: Всегда существовала потребность в холодильниках для хранения фруктов и овощей хорошего качества. Этот холодильник предназначен для хранения большого количества продуктов в ресторанах, кафе и больших кухнях. Внутренняя емкость, то есть объем, составляет 866 литров и работает от напряжения 220В.
short_description_en: There has always been a need for refrigerators to keep fruits and vegetables good and of good quality. This refrigerator is designed for storing large quantities of food in restaurants, cafes and large kitchens. The internal capacity, that is, the volume, is 866 liters and operates at 220V voltage.
long_description:
There has always been a need for refrigerators to keep fruits and vegetables good and of good quality. This refrigerator is designed for storing large quantities of food in restaurants, cafes and large kitchens. The internal capacity, that is, the volume, is 866 liters and operates at 220V voltage.

 

 

General parameters
Model US-BCL0623S
Climate type 4
Class of protection against electric current 1-class
Consumption capacity 3.70KW /24 hour
Rated power 330W
Total usage capacity 866L
Voltage 220V
Dimension 1200x740x1895 mm
Weight 110kg
long_description_uz:
Meva va sabzavotlarni yaxshi va sifatli saqlash uchun har doim muzlatgichlarga ehtiyoj bo'lgan. Ushbu muzlatgich restoranlar, kafelar va katta oshxonalarda katta hajmdagi oziq-ovqatlarni saqlash uchun mo'ljallangan. Ichki sig'imi, ya'ni hajmi 866 litrni tashkil etadi va 220V kuchlanishda ishlaydi.

 

 

Umumiy parametrlar
Model US-BCL0623S
Iqlim turi 4ta
Elektr tokidan himoya qilish sinfi 1-sinf
Iste'mol quvvati  3.70KW /24soat
Nominal quvvat 330W
Umumiy foydalanish hajmi 866L
Kuchlanishi 220V
O'lchamlari 1200x740x1895 mm
Vazni 110kg
long_description_ru:
Всегда существовала потребность в холодильниках для хранения фруктов и овощей хорошего качества. Этот холодильник предназначен для хранения большого количества продуктов в ресторанах, кафе и больших кухнях. Внутренняя емкость, то есть объем, составляет 866 литров и работает от напряжения 220В.

 

 

Общие параметры
Модель US-BCL0623S
Тип климата 4
Класс защиты от электрического тока 1 класс
Потребляемая мощность 3,70 кВт/24 часа
Номинальная мощность 330 Вт
Общий объем использования 866 л
Напряжение 220В
Размеры 1200x740x1895 мм
Масса 110 кг
long_description_en:
There has always been a need for refrigerators to keep fruits and vegetables good and of good quality. This refrigerator is designed for storing large quantities of food in restaurants, cafes and large kitchens. The internal capacity, that is, the volume, is 866 liters and operates at 220V voltage.

 

 

General parameters
Model US-BCL0623S
Climate type 4
Class of protection against electric current 1-class
Consumption capacity 3.70KW /24 hour
Rated power 330W
Total usage capacity 866L
Voltage 220V
Dimension 1200x740x1895 mm
Weight 110kg
